Title: Enhancing Text Summarization: Evaluating Transformer-Based Models and the Role of Large Language Models like ChatGPT
Abstract: in today‚äôs world as a substantial amount of textual data is generated processing and summarizing this data in a meaningful way has become a significant research area. text summarization aims to extract concise and informative summaries from textual data. in this study the performance of transformer based models in text summarization is evaluated by comparing them with human generated summaries. additionally the utility of large language models like chatgpt in the field of summarization is investigated. the study presents detailed insights into the summarization performance of transformer based models such as bart and t5 aiming to guide future research in summarization.
